Solve Problems.Description: Ability to execute tasks based on a set of provided guidelines or instructions. Can handle multi-step instructions with detailed guidance spanning numerous steps and isntructions

Complete a variety of tasks by logically processing multiple steps using given data, context, or constraints. This approach is highly versatile—applicable to debugging, ideation, and any scenario that benefits from iterative thinking.

Provide recommendations tailored to user needs or preferences by leveraging reasoning capabilities. Considers user requirements and constraints while drawing on world knowledge to suggest relevant options.
Determine whether text meets specified guidelines by comparing the input against compliance criteria. This capability enables the model to generate an assessment on whether guidelines are satisfied.
Independently carry out tasks in a multi-step process, often using external tools and deciding how and when to apply them. Can conduct flexible and open-ended tasks than a predefined workflow.

Communicate.Description: Engage in a dialogue by understanding user intent, answering questions, and maintaining context and conversation flow.
Adapt messages based on user attributes or past interactions.
Imitate the tone or manner of a user or context to align the communication style.
Clarify information, concepts, and processes to assist users in understanding and learning.

Extract Info.Description: Identify and categorise specific items such as names, places, or terms in text, and provide the extracted entities as an output.

Extract and organise information from unstructured sources into a structured format (e.g., JSON). Goes beyond basic keyword searches by understanding the meaning of the input, classifying it accordingly, and generating the data in a predefined schema or structure.
Group data or text into predefined categories based on its characteristics or context.

Analyse & Transform.Description: Deliver concise overviews of lengthy documents or unstructured text (including transcripts).
Recognise the mood, feeling, or emotion expressed in a text.
Produce text that reflects the style, tone, or format of a reference or source text.

Generate Information.Description: Produce written content based on various inputs, including text, data, images, or video.
Modify existing text for new purposes while preserving its core meaning.
Create realistic synthetic data—structured or unstructured (e.g., conversations, customer profiles)—based on example data or guidelines.
Write code to fulfill user-specified requirements or prompts.
Transform text from one language to another while preserving its intended meaning.
Produce new ideas, hypotheses, or scenarios, offer feedback, and participate in brainstorming discussions.

Basic.Description: Identify and retrieve text content from an image.
Recognise and categorise objects depicted in an image.
Categorise an image according to specific criteria.

Complex.Description: Comprehend an image at both high-level and granular detail, interpreting its content comprehensively.
Analyse and interpret visual information to solve problems or tasks, such as counting objects or assessing spatial relationships.
Interpret video content by examining multiple frames, effectively stitching information together for a broader context.
Offer feedback on an image or a video and recommend enhancements or modifications.

Voice Input & Output.Description: Convert audio into text transcripts, including timestamps and speaker annotations.

Facilitate voice-based interactions in a free-flowing manner without explicit transcription. The model naturally interprets speech, including emotional cues and ambient sounds, and can respond with natural-sounding voice output.
Transcribe spoken input into text for processing by the model. Note that certain non-verbal cues or nuances may be lost in the transcription.
Provide vocal responses generated from a text input, producing a realistic and natural-sounding voice.
Replicate and synthesise a specific voice to produce audio output from textual input, enabling the generation of speech in that voice.
Create music or audio effects based on text prompts. Can produce vocal tracks, instrumental pieces, or sound effects to supplement media content. Can also mimic particular styles or genres.

Image.Description: Create images from a text-based prompt, with some capability to include text on images. These prompts can range from brief statements to longer paragraphs.
Modify an image by replacing specific elements with generated content or by extending the image boundaries.
Convert or stylise an existing image according to a text prompt, altering its appearance while retaining the fundamental subject matter.
Merge or blend multiple images into a single composite, integrating elements from each source image.

Video.Description: Produce short videos from a text prompt.
Create a video from a still image, guided by a text prompt for greater control over style and content.
Transform one video into another by retaining the original’s actions but altering its style or adding overlays based on a text or image prompt.

Enabling Capability.Description: Collaborate with other software or tools (including search) to expand functional capabilities.
Produce outputs that adhere to a predefined schema or structure to facilitate integration with other systems.
Access documentation or files to retrieve relevant information, then incorporate this data into the model’s context.
Run code snippets for tasks such as analyzing small datasets or executing lightweight software components.
Use the code execution feature to write and run code against a dataset, allowing the model to analyse data through code.
